scripts.test: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node -r dotenv/config --require dotenv/config --env-file=.env --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test
scripts.local: NODE_ENV=test CHAIN=local COMPILE=false DEPLOY=true MINT=true BUY=true TRANSFER=true npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.devnet.zkcloudworker: NODE_ENV=test CHAIN=devnet LOCAL_CLOUD_WORKER=false COMPILE=false DEPLOY=true MINT=true BUY=true TRANSFER=true npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
scripts.zeko.local: NODE_ENV=test CHAIN=zeko CLOUD=local COMPILE=false DEPLOY=true MINT=true BUY=true TRANSFER=true node --test worker.test
scripts.zeko.zkcloudworker: NODE_ENV=test CHAIN=zeko CLOUD=zkcloudworker COMPILE=false DEPLOY=true MINT=true BUY=true TRANSFER=true npm run test ./test/worker.test.ts
